0101111010101111 0101111001011000 1 -> sum: 1011110100001000, cout: 0
1001000000111000 0010111100001111 1 -> sum: 1011111101001000, cout: 0
0010110101100010 0000110100110110 0 -> sum: 0011101010011000, cout: 0
1011011100101111 1111000100010101 0 -> sum: 1010100001000100, cout: 1
1110100101010110 0010011101010011 0 -> sum: 0001000010101001, cout: 1
1101111001001101 0001010100010000 0 -> sum: 1111001101011101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
